Utilities

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Hovers

Hover over to see magic happen

Text

Text hover effects
Text
To change text color on hover add a .text-hover-{COLOR} class. Colors are from boba's palette.
.text-hover-red Add a .text-hover-red with to make the text red on hover Hello World, I'm red
.text-hover-orange Add a .text-hover-orange with to make the text orange on hover Hello World, I'm orange
.text-hover-yellow Add a .text-hover-yellow with to make the text yellow on hover Hello World, I'm yellow
.text-hover-green Add a .text-hover-green with to make the text green on hover Hello World, I'm green
.text-hover-teal Add a .text-hover-teal with to make the text teal on hover Hello World, I'm teal
.text-hover-blue Add a .text-hover-blue with to make the text blue on hover Hello World, I'm blue
.text-hover-indigo Add a .text-hover-indigo with to make the text indigo on hover Hello World, I'm indigo
.text-hover-purple Add a .text-hover-purple with to make the text purple on hover Hello World, I'm purple
.text-hover-pink Add a .text-hover-pink with to make the text pink on hover Hello World, I'm pink
.text-hover-dark Add a .text-hover-dark with to make the text dark on hover Hello World, I'm dark
.text-hover-light Add a .text-hover-light with to make the text light on hover Hello World, I'm light
.text-hover-black Add a .text-hover-black with to make the text black on hover Hello World, I'm black
.text-hover-white Add a .text-hover-white with to make the text white on hover Hello World, I'm white

Border

Border hover effects
Border
To change border color on hover add a .border-hover-{COLOR} class. Colors are from boba's palette.
.border-hover-red Add a .border-hover-red with to make the border red on hover
.border-hover-orange Add a .border-hover-orange with to make the border orange on hover
.border-hover-yellow Add a .border-hover-yellow with to make the border yellow on hover
.border-hover-green Add a .border-hover-green with to make the border green on hover
.border-hover-teal Add a .border-hover-teal with to make the border teal on hover
.border-hover-blue Add a .border-hover-blue with to make the border blue on hover
